translated: They do not take rebirth in those meditative concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions.

original: gzhan du na sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir /ğŸ”½de dag tu skye zhing sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu @480a *//

translated: Rather, they are born in those realms in order to benefit sentient beings.

translated: They do not see emptiness of defining characteristics as a thing, a substance, or a sign.ğŸ”½They do not see emptiness of non-apprehension as a thing, a substance, or a sign.

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po dang rdzas dang mtshan mar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

analyzed: ji ltar na gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @519b 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /
translated: How is it that the four fearlessnesses are neither grasped nor rejected?

analyzed: ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags / ji ltar na byams pa chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na snying rje chen po yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung @520a *// ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na rang byang chub yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

analyzed: ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba lags /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor / gzugs yid la mi byed pas gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzugs yid la mi byed pas gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: SubhÅ«ti, form is not appropriated and not released because it is not mentally constructed.

original: tshor ba yid la mi byed pas tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba yid la mi byed pas tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to feeling, he does not grasp or reject feeling.

original: 'du shes yid la mi byed pas 'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'du shes yid la mi byed pas 'du shes yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to perception, he does not grasp or reject perception.

original: 'du byed yid la mi byed pas 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed yid la mi byed pas 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to volitional factors, he does not grasp or reject volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to consciousness, he does not grasp or reject consciousness.

original: mig yid la mi byed pas mig yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: mig yid la mi byed pas mig yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the eyes, he does not grasp or reject the eyes.

original: rna ba yid la mi byed pas rna ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //ğŸ”½sna yid la mi byed pas sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rna ba yid la mi byed pas rna ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no // sna yid la mi byed pas sna yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the ears, he does not grasp or reject the ears.ğŸ”½Since he does not pay attention to the nose, he does not grasp or reject the nose.

original: lce yid la mi byed pas lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: lce yid la mi byed pas lce yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the tongue, he does not grasp or reject the tongue.

original: lus yid @520b la mi byed pas lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: lus yid @520b la mi byed pas lus yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the body, he does not grasp or reject the body.

original: yid yid la mi byed pas yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: yid yid la mi byed pas yid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since the mind does not attend to the mind, the mind is neither grasped nor released.

original: gzugs yid la mi byed pas gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: gzugs yid la mi byed pas gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //

analyzed: sgra yid la mi byed pas sgra yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no // dri yid la mi byed pas dri yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since sound is not attended to, sound is neither grasped nor released.ğŸ”½Since smell is not attended to, smell is neither grasped nor released.

original: ro yid la mi byed pas ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: ro yid la mi byed pas ro yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since taste is not attended to, taste is neither grasped nor released.

original: reg yid la mi byed pas reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: reg yid la mi byed pas reg yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since touch is not attended to, touch is neither grasped nor released.

original: chos yid la mi byed pas chos yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //ğŸ”½mig gi rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: chos yid la mi byed pas chos yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no // mig gi rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since mental phenomena are not attended to, mental phenomena are neither grasped nor released.ğŸ”½Since eye consciousness is not attended to, eye consciousness is neither grasped nor released.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since ear consciousness is not attended to, ear consciousness is neither grasped nor released.

original: sna'i rnam par shes ba yid la mi byed pas sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes ba yid la mi byed pas sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the nose consciousness, since he does not attend to it.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the tongue consciousness, since he does not attend to it.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the body consciousness, since he does not attend to it.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //ğŸ”½mig @521a *// gi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no // mig @521a *// gi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the thinking-mind consciousness, since he does not attend to it.ğŸ”½He does not grasp or reject eye-contact, since he does not attend to it.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject ear-contact, since he does not attend to it.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not pay attention to nose contact, and so does not grasp at it or reject it.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not pay attention to tongue contact, and so does not grasp at it or reject it.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not pay attention to body contact, and so does not grasp at it or reject it.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi byed pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not pay attention to thinking-mind contact, and so does not grasp at it or reject it.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not pay attention to feelings that arise from eye contact, and so does not grasp at them or reject them.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //ğŸ”½sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no // sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the contact of the ear, by not attending to it.ğŸ”½He does not grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the contact of the nose, by not attending to it.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba @521b yid la mi byed pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba @521b yid la mi byed pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the contact of the tongue, by not attending to it.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the contact of the body, by not attending to it.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yid la mi byed pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the feeling that arises from the contact of the mental faculty, because he does not pay attention to it.

original: sa'i khams yid la mi byed pas sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams yid la mi byed pas sa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the earth element, because he does not pay attention to it.

original: chu'i khams yid la mi byed pas chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: chu'i khams yid la mi byed pas chu'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the water element, because he does not pay attention to it.

original: me'i khams yid la mi byed pas me'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: me'i khams yid la mi byed pas me'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the fire element, because he does not pay attention to it.

original: rlung gi khams yid la mi byed pas rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rlung gi khams yid la mi byed pas rlung gi khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the wind element, because he does not pay attention to it.

original: nam mkha'i khams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the space element, because he does not pay attention to it.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la mi byed pas rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la mi byed pas rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: He does not grasp or reject the consciousness element, because he does not pay attention to it.

original: ma rig pa yid la mi byed pas ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: ma rig pa yid la mi byed pas ma rig pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to ignorance, he does not grasp or reject ignorance.

original: 'du byed yid la mi byed pas 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed yid la mi byed pas 'du byed yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to volitional forces, he does not grasp or reject volitional forces.

original: rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma @522a *//ğŸ”½btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yid la mi byed pas rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ma @522a *// btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to consciousness, he does not grasp or reject consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs yid la mi byed pas ming dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yid la mi byed pas ming dang gzugs yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to name-and-form, he does not grasp or reject name-and-form.

original: skye mched drug yid la mi byed pas skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: skye mched drug yid la mi byed pas skye mched drug yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the six sense bases, he does not grasp or reject the six sense bases.

original: reg pa yid la mi byed pas reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: reg pa yid la mi byed pas reg pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to contact, he does not grasp or reject contact.

original: tshor ba yid la mi byed pas tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba yid la mi byed pas tshor ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to feeling, he does not grasp or reject feeling.

original: sred pa yid la mi byed pas sred pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: sred pa yid la mi byed pas sred pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to craving, he does not grasp or reject craving.

original: len pa yid la mi byed pas len pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: len pa yid la mi byed pas len pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to appropriation, he does not grasp or reject appropriation.

original: srid pa yid la mi byed pas srid pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: srid pa yid la mi byed pas srid pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to becoming, he does not grasp or reject becoming.

original: skye ba yid la mi byed pas skye ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: skye ba yid la mi byed pas skye ba yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to birth, he does not grasp or reject birth.

original: rga shi yid la mi byed pas rga shi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rga shi yid la mi byed pas rga shi yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to old age and death, he does not grasp or reject old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the perfection of giving, he does not grasp or reject the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the perfection of morality, he does not grasp or reject the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the perfection of patience, he does not grasp or reject the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus @522b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: brtson 'grus @522b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not take up or give up the perfection of perseverance because they do not pay attention to the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not take up or give up the perfection of concentration because they do not pay attention to the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //ğŸ”½nang stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //ğŸ”½phyi stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no // nang stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no // phyi stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas phyi stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not take up or give up the perfection of wisdom because they do not pay attention to the perfection of wisdom.ğŸ”½They do not take up or give up inner emptiness because they do not pay attention to inner emptiness.ğŸ”½They do not take up or give up outer emptiness because they do not pay attention to outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la mi byed par phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la mi byed par phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not take up or give up inner and outer emptiness because they do not pay attention to inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of emptiness, he does not grasp at it and does not reject it.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas chen po stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the great emptiness, he does not grasp at it and does not reject it.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //ğŸ”½'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no // 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of ultimate reality, he does not grasp at it and does not reject it.ğŸ”½Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of the conditioned, he does not grasp at it and does not reject it.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid @523a *//ğŸ”½yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid @523a *// yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of the unconditioned, he does not grasp at it and does not reject it.ğŸ”½Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of the infinite, he does not grasp at it and does not reject it.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, he does not grasp at it and does not reject it.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since they do not pay attention to the emptiness of no beginning and no end, they do not grasp or reject the emptiness of no beginning and no end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since they do not pay attention to the emptiness of no rejection, they do not grasp or reject the emptiness of no rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since they do not pay attention to the emptiness of inherent existence, they do not grasp or reject the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since they do not pay attention to the emptiness of all phenomena, they do not grasp or reject the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs sum bzung ma btang ba yin no;/
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs sum bzung ma btang ba yin no;/
translated: Since they do not pay attention to the emptiness of defining attributes, they do not grasp or reject the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of non-apprehension, he does not grasp or reject the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of non-entities, he does not grasp or reject the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung @523b ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung @523b ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of essential nature, he does not grasp or reject the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, he does not grasp or reject the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: Since he does not pay attention to the four establishments of mindfulness, he does not grasp or reject the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la mi byed pas yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la mi byed pas yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the four right efforts, because they do not pay attention to them.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the four legs of manifestation, because they do not pay attention to them.

original: dbang po lnga yid la mi byed pas dbang po rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: dbang po lnga yid la mi byed pas dbang po rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the five faculties, because they do not pay attention to them.

original: stobs lnga yid la mi byed pas stobs rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: stobs lnga yid la mi byed pas stobs rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the five powers, because they do not pay attention to them.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la mi byed pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la mi byed pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the seven factors of awakening, because they do not pay attention to them.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la mi byed pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la mi byed pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the noble eightfold path, because they do not pay attention to it.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the Four Noble Truths, because they do not pay attention to them.

original: bsam gtan bzhi yid la mi byed pas bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang @524a *//ğŸ”½ba yin no //ğŸ”½tshad med pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas tshad med pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yid la mi byed pas bsam gtan rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang @524a *// ba yin no // tshad med pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas tshad med pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the four meditations, because they do not pay attention to them.ğŸ”½They do not grasp or reject the four formless concentrations, because they do not pay attention to them.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la mi byed pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su ma bzung ma btang ba yin no //
translated: They do not grasp or reject the four formless absorptions, because they do not pay attention to them.
